Name: Total Ski Jump
About the game: Total Ski Jump is a single/multiplayer game. The game is good to play with your friends due to its (unrealistic) fair scoring system. You can also play singleplayer against CPU. The game features: -singleplayer/multiplayer competitions -variable weather conditions -jumper creator -hill creation manual
